text: Guillem Areny Areny (1931 - 30 December 2020) was an Andorran politician. He was Mayor of La Massana from 1962 to 1963. He also was a member of the Council General from 1966 to 1969 and again from 1974 to 1981. Areny died on 30 December 2020, aged 89.Mor l'exc√≤nsol i exconseller general Guillem Areny Areny ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Andorran politicians
